content.question: What is the slope of the line tangent to the curve <math alttext="the square root of x, end root, plus, the square root of y, end root, equals 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msqrt><mo>+</mo><msqrt><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></math> at the point <math alttext="with coordinates nine fourths comma one fourth" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>9</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow><mo>,</mo><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math> ?

unit.text: 3: Differentiation: Composite, Implicit, and Inverse Functions

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
